name: TAC-CORP VIP Access
detailed_description:
Customize each ship to your liking with colors and patterns making you stand out from the rest.

TUNNEL EDITOR
The TUNNEL EDITOR is the official mapping tool for TUNNEL DIVERS. Create your own maps and upload them to the workshop. You can use it for as long as you like and upload as many maps as you want.

SHIP CUSTOMIZATION
Edit the colors of your ships, give it a cool pattern and even it's own afterburner effect! With ship customization, you'll stand out from the crowd of boring bland grey ships while battling in deep space.

TUNNEL SERVER SYSTEM
Internet is bad? No admin access to your network? Port-forwarding too hard?

The Tunnel Servers are here to save the day. Generate a server to play on with your settings and level list. Host as many times as you like for as long as you like with this one time DLC payment.

WARNING:
  • Custom maps are unavailable when cloud hosting. Servers only available in the US West region right now, but expanding to new locations is possible.

short_description: Corporate VIP only!!! This DLC allows you to customize all of your unlocked ships' look, host servers on the cloud for when you need it, and gives you access to the in-depth level editor, TUNNEL EDITOR.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: ~2.0GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
